TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
the ITER resets.

i wish KSP was real.

Granted....Now yo are a kerbal being tortured by Danny2465 and Nexter lab

I wish for nothing

Granted. You get a glass jar full of nothing. The glass is extremely thin, however, so the vacuum inside the car shatters it in your hands, creating painful gashes.

The medical bills amount to so much that you now have nothing.

 

I wish for a sea green Fender Stratocaster.

Edited October 1, 2018 by Kernel Kraken

Granted. You get a caster wheel with a green fender, several kilometers above the ground.
It lands in your yard with a swish and a thump.

I wish for public transit which is faster than just riding my bike.

Granted, a bus hits your bike and drags you along for several kilometers. 

 

I whish for a nice coffee. 

And a bagel

Granted.

Spoiler

This is a nice coffee...

Spoiler

And this is a (nice) bagel...

Spoiler

Watched them? 

Now get out.

 

I wish to clean dust from my table and am going to do this right now.

Granted. You are turned into a cleaning robot, doomed to clean tables for all eternity.

I wish for a friend

Granted - you are now my friend (because Dookie is one of my favorite albums).

Unfortunately you will need to babysit my feral children for all school holidays, ever.

I wish there were no school holidays.

Edited October 8, 2018 by James Kerman
Forgot to make a wish

What is wrong with you

I wish I was a little bit taller, I wish I was a baller, I wish I had a girl who looked good, I would call her, wish I had a rabbit in the hat with a bat, and a '64 Impala.

Edited October 8, 2018 by Guest

You get a half millimeter taller, you get to be a baller but break your ankle, you get a girl who looks good by your astronomically low standards, you break your cell phone after getting her number, the rabbit dies and you crash your car.

I wish I was 4 inches taller.

You find yourself in a fantasy medieval world.
A day later they make you 4 inches taller. Even without magic.
It was not a good idea to tell them about the space exploration.

I wish there was a cosmic aether.

Granted, you are teleported to a parallel universe where the laws of physics as you know them are no more, meaning your body stops working under the new laws. You become dust instantly.

I wish I was able to never sleep without adverse effects.

Granted. Now you always sleep with adverse effects.

I wish to understand why such strange wish.

You have been granted a strange wish reason at the expense of the flavour of your life. Welcome to office life Joe.

I wish for a fully functional gaming laptop with no strings attached, figuratively and literally.

Granted, but your house is flooded, destroying the laptop forever.

I wish that flight school didn't cost $92,000

Granted; it costs $92001.

I wish for a better understanding of how to shade duct tape by pencil.

Knowledge granted, however, by all circumstances you are unable to use this knowledge.

I wish for an uncorruptable wish that I am freely allowed to use at any given moment, without any restrictions.

Granted.
You get an uncorruptable wish, use it without any restrictions and...

Spoiler

... nothing happens.

No effects were required from that wish.


I wish to know how many slices should be in the sphere of diameter=36 to match segments 15 and 19.

The universe splits by 0 and breaks.

I wish for an ice cream

All ice cream is broken after division by 0.

(Restoring the Universe with the l'Hospital rule)

i go to mars 

(and i forget my spacesuit)

..wrong thread?

I want perfect teeth without having to have braces.

Granted. Instead, each of your teeth will be ripped out and manually replaced in the correct orientation.

We ran out of anesthetic by the way.

 

I wish for my grades to go up further so my parents don't hate me

Granted, but you have to do the work.

I wish for a device which will 3D print tacos at the press of a button.

Granted, but they're all plastic.

I wish for a computer that can actually run a game created more recently than 2013

(Also, I can't believe this thread is still going strong after over 6 years)
